article.headline: UC Santa Barbara 82, CS Northridge 76 (OT)
article.story: LOS ANGELES (AP) -- Chris Devine scored a career-high 25 points including the tying basket to force overtime and seven free throws in the extra period to lead UC Santa Barbara to an 82-76 victory over Cal State Northridge in the regular-season finale for both teams. Devine, who also grabbed a career-best 14 rebounds, tied the game 64-64 with 11.9 seconds remaining when he grabbed an offensive rebound after a blocked shot and banked it in from two feet away. Devine's basket finished a 28-10 run over the final 11 minutes, 3 seconds for the Gauchos (14-13, 6-8 Big West), who scored 13 of their 18 overtime points at the free-throw line. With the win, UC Santa Barbara earned the fifth seed in the Big West Conference Tournament that begins Wednesday. The Gauchos will play No. 8 seed UC Riverside in the first round. The teams split their season series. Cal State Northridge (11-16, 4-10) dropped to the seventh seed and will play No. 6 Cal State Fullerton Wednesday. Mike Efevberha led Northridge with 19 points off the bench, and Calvin Chitwood added 16 points. Joe See scored all of his season-high 19 points in the second half and overtime for UC Santa Barbara. His 3-pointer with 1:40 to play in overtime gave Santa Barbara a 72-69 lead that it never relinquished. Cameron Goettsche scored 18 points for the Gauchos, and Alex Harris added 10 points.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
